shows.title: Samba Reggae
shows.desc:
Learn some Afro-Brazilian samba-reggae moves and get the whole family dancing to the high energy infectious beats from north-east Brazil. Learn to dance individually but move as a group (a “bloco”). No experience necessary. Ages 5+

Baila Studios is a Carnival Arts organisation led by Selva Romero-Toledo, running community and festival dance workshops since 2007.

shows.title: Salsa
shows.desc:
Salsa is a popular, sociable dance set to lively music – we will learn a simple sequence. No partner is necessary, just enthusiasm! The workshop is aimed at adults and is open to all levels.

Baila Studios is a Carnival Arts organisation led by Selva Romero-Toledo, running community and festival dance workshops since 2007.
